amendment.description: Amendment delayed the effective date of the bill by six months from the time of enactment and required the Department of Labor to educate small businesses with respect to what is required under law and to assist them with compliance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-807 to delay the effective date of the bill by six months from the time of enactment. The amendment requires the Department of Labor to educate small businesses about what is required under law and assist them with compliance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Altmire amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 426 - 1 (Roll no. 552).
